name: Red Hologram Generator
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Equipment/Gear/Technological Gear/On Signals/Hologram Generator/Red Hologram Generator

sections.body: A red hologram generator functions as a green one, except that it can create two images within range simultaneously. Directing these images is a free action. A red hologram generator can store up to 11 images or 3 minutes of moving imagery.
